name: Felecia Kidd
about: awesome fridge. one of the best I've ever used. 10 years of buying already and still working like it's a new one. Alot of compartments to store dairies and vegies and other foods. I love it! I recommend this to everyone

name: Doyle Dodson
about: I hate it cause neither the price is affordable nor the fridge.
